name: inferno-games-rest
description: Java backend service for Inferno Games

scripts.docker:build-compile: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && docker buildx build --target compile-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PROJECT=$PROJECT -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:compile .
scripts.docker:build-runtime: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && export VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && PORT=$(jq -r .port package.json) && docker buildx build --target runtime-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 --build-arg PORT=$PORT --build-arg PROJECT=$PROJECT -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:$VERSION -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:latest .
scripts.docker:push: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && export VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker push infernokun/$PROJECT:$VERSION && docker push infernokun/$PROJECT:latest
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build-compile -s && npm run docker:build-runtime -s && npm run docker:push -s
